00101 #define DEFINE_DRLC_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(clLoadControlEventInd,           \
00102                                      clCancelLoadControlEventInd,     \
00103                                      clCancelAllLoadControlEventsInd, \
00104                                      clReportEventStatusInd,          \
00105                                      clGetScheduledEventsInd) \
00106   DEFINE_COMMAND(loadControlEventCommand,           0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clLoadControlEventInd), \
00107   DEFINE_COMMAND(cancelLoadControlEventCommand,     0x01, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clCancelLoadControlEventInd), \
00108   DEFINE_COMMAND(cancelAllLoadControlEventsCommand, 0x02, COMMAND_OPTIONS(SERVER_TO_CLIENT, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clCancelAllLoadControlEventsInd), \
00109   DEFINE_COMMAND(reportEventStatusCommand,          0x00, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clReportEventStatusInd), \
00110   DEFINE_COMMAND(getScheduledEventsCommand,         0x01, COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), clGetScheduledEventsInd)

00121 #define DRLC_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00122   { \
00123     .id = DEMAND_RESPONSE_AND_LOAD_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00124     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00125     .attributesAmount = DRLC_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00126     .attributes = NULL, \
00127     .commandsAmount = DRLC_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00128     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands \
00129   }
00130 
00131 #define DRLC_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00132   { \
00133     .id = DEMAND_RESPONSE_AND_LOAD_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00134     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00135     .attributesAmount = DRLC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00136     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes, \
00137     .commandsAmount = DRLC_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00138     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands \
00139   }

00175 BEGIN_PACK
00176 
00180 typedef union PACK
00181 {
00182   uint16_t value;
00183   struct 
00184   {
00185     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(8,(
00186       uint16_t hvacCompressor : 1,
00187       uint16_t stripHeaters : 1,
00188       uint16_t waterHeater : 1,
00189       uint16_t poolPump : 1,
00190       uint16_t smartAppliances : 1,
00191       uint16_t irrigationPump : 1,
00192       uint16_t managedCommercAndIndustrLoads : 1,
00193       uint16_t simpleMiscLoads : 1
00194     ))
00195     LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(5,(
00196       uint16_t exteriorLighting : 1,
00197       uint16_t interiorLighting : 1,
00198       uint16_t electricalVehicle : 1,
00199       uint16_t generationSystem : 1,
00200       uint16_t reserved : 4
00201     ))
00202   };
00203 } ZCL_DeviceClass_t;
00204 
00208 typedef struct PACK
00209 {
00210   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(3,(
00211     uint8_t randStartTime : 1,
00212     uint8_t randEndTime : 1,
00213     uint8_t reserved : 6
00214   ))
00215 } ZCL_EventControl_t;
00216 
00220 typedef struct PACK
00221 {
00222   uint32_t  issuerEventId;
00223   ZCL_DeviceClass_t  deviceClass;
00224   uint8_t   utilityEnrolmentGroup;
00225   uint32_t  startTime;
00226   uint16_t  durationInMinutes;
00227   uint8_t   criticalityLevel;
00228   uint8_t   coolingTemperatureOffset;
00229   uint8_t   heatingTemperatureOffset;
00230   uint16_t  coolingTemperatureSetPoint;
00231   uint16_t  heatingTemperatureSetPoint;
00232   int8_t    avrgLoadAdjstPercentage;
00233   uint8_t   dutyCycle;
00234   ZCL_EventControl_t eventControl;
00235 } ZCL_LoadControlEvent_t;

00245   ))

00268   struct PACK

00274   } utilityEnrolmentGroupAttr;

00302 
00303 } ZCL_DemandResponseClientClusterAttributes_t;
00304 
00308 typedef struct PACK
00309 {
00310   uint32_t            issuerEventId;
00311   uint8_t             eventStatus;
00312   ZCL_UTCTime_t       eventStatusTime;
00313   uint8_t             criticalityLevelApplied;
00314   uint16_t            coolingTemperatureSetPointApplied;
00315   uint16_t            heatingTemperatureSetPointApplied;
00316   int8_t              avrgLoadAdjstPercentageApplied;

00320   uint8_t             signature[REPORT_EVENT_STATUS_SIGNATURE_LENGTH];
00321 } ZCL_ReportEventStatus_t;
